entry.title: Blvck Reversible Puffer Coat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Outerwear
Price: 400.00

Introducing the 'Blvck Reversible Puffer Coat', this jacket is filled with down feather to provide unparalleled warmth and an investment which you will re-wear season after season.

The coat is reversible with one minimalistic all black side and the other side embellished with monograms all over the jacket and has a reflective black UV gloss. 

Washing care: Hand Wash or Dry clean 

Inner: 90% Duck Down, 10% Polyester 

The model is wearing S and is 1m80.

Vendor: Blvck Paris

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, our sweatpants are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear. 

Fits true to size.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Pants
Price: 110.00

Part of the BLVCK03 Collection, the 'Bold Minimalist Sweats' features an embroidered BLVCK logo on the outside of the front leg with a branded Blvck drawstring to give you the ultimate Blvck experience. These sweatpants are warm and perfect for a casual, laidback day.

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, our sweatpants are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Oversized fit. 

The model is wearing a size S and is 1m72.

entry.summary:

Type: Bags & Leather
Price: 300.00

Blvck is thrilled to unveil the signature 'Blvck Lilith Bag', crafted from luxurious leather to carry all your daily necessities.

Experience the ultimate style and function with our Blvck Lilith Bag. Crafted from luxurious black leather, this leather bag features a striking customized metal plate featuring our iconic Blvck Paris logo. Elevate your look and make a statement with every step.

entry.title: Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: High-Tech
Price: 60.00

With the Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin, your device will never look the same. Made from premium materials, and laser cut to offer the best fit the Blvck MacBook Skin adds a touch of elegance to an otherwise generic design.

Upgrade your lifestyle today and wrap your MacBook in our luxurious Blvck MacBook Skin! 

Please note that this is a skin that you apply as a sticker to your MacBook (not a case) and that a spacing of 1-2mm may be visible on the edges once applied.

Package Included
-One top body skin Cover
-One keyboard/trackpad surround cover
-One bottom skin Cover

s:variant.title: Blvck Monogram MacBook Pro Skin 16.2 2021-2023

entry.title: Blvck Teddy Christmas Keychain
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 60.00

The limited festive edition of the 'Blvck Evil Teddy Christmas Keyring' ensures that you can bring a piece of luxury wherever you go. Crafted from the softest 100% cotton, its branded black hoodie and elegant details bring out its stylish 'All Black' look. An ideal gift, or a keepsake to be treasured, this plush and charming keyring is sure to please all who are searching for a chic and fashionable accessory.

Small Blvck Teddy Bear is 4inch/10cm high. The product is handmade and size may slightly vary.

entry.title: Blvck Tee 'Grey'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Tees
Price: 75.00

Introducing Shades of Blvck, our latest collection of essentials, available in three different shades. 

The Blvck Tee 'Grey' boasts a light grey tone and an oversized fit.

The back features a bold 'Blvck Paris' logo in UV print and the front features a subtle logo in the chest in UV rubber print. 

Crafted from a luxurious blend of fleece cotton, it's impossibly soft to the touch and lends a perfect fit for whichever activity the day may bring.

This piece boasts an oversized fit.

The model is wearing a size S and is 1m72

entry.title: Blvck Blazer Dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Pants
Price: 200.00

The 'Blvck Blazer dress' is endowed with an asymmetric silhouette that is graced with a sleek belt. This timeless piece is the perfect choice for a night out, granting you a look of effortless sophistication.

The model is wearing a size XS and is 1m72True to size fit. 

Fabric: 70% polyester, 26% cotton, 4% spandex

Introducing Shades of Blvck, our latest collection of essentials, available in three different shades. 

The Blvck Hoodie 'Grey' boasts a light grey tone and an oversized fit.

The back features a bold 'Blvck Paris' logo in UV print and the front features a subtle logo in the chest in UV rubber print. 

Crafted from a luxurious blend of fleece cotton, it's impossibly soft to the touch and lends a perfect fit for whichever activity the day may bring.

The model is wearing a size S and is 1m72
